snippet: VICKERS--Frederick W. We deeply mourn the passing of our good friend for many years. He died February 25, 2016. Fred will be very much missed. The wake will be held at Frank Campbell Funeral Home at Madison and 81st Tuesday March 8th - 3 to 5pm and 7 to 9pm. The Funeral Service will take place the next day March 9th and will be held at St Bartholomew's Church, Park and 50th St at 4pm with Reception immediately following. 1/3
lead_paragraph: VICKERS--Frederick W. We deeply mourn the passing of our good friend for many years. He died February 25, 2016. Fred will be very much missed. The wake will be held at Frank Campbell Funeral Home at Madison and 81st Tuesday March 8th - 3 to 5pm and 7 to 9pm. The Funeral Service will take place the next day March 9th and will be held at St Bartholomew's Church, Park and 50th St at 4pm with Reception immediately following. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  VICKERS, FREDERICK W
